title: Upland spot cotton price in the U.S. 1990 to 2018
yAxis: Price per pound in U.S. cents
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Price per pound in U.S. cents. In total the number of data points it has is 21.
In general Price per pound in U.S. cents has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Price per pound in U.S. cents, about 132.6 was reported at Year 2011
The lowest Price per pound in U.S. cents, of value 36.99 was reported at Year 2002
